entry.title: New blog!
entry.summary:
I haven't blogged for a while and I think that I needed I new (virtual) home for my rants. This place is brand new (and white!) and it is going to be awesome!

I don't know what will happen with my previous domain (emotionull) but I think it might be the new home for a new (underground) social network for traders. We'll see.

My hobby project right now, is a new opensource trading platform (for the first time not focused on HFT) and some experiments around a super fast, vertical scaling, full adhoc queries database (exactly the opposite of LDB I've built at BugSense). I'll keep you posted.

Good times!

JR
